post_detail.title: PromaxBDA 2013 Awards
post_detail.description:
Click 3X is proud to announce that we won several PromaxBDA Awards

GOLD for Best On-Air Typography - Lifetime 'My Life is a Lifetime Movie'

GOLD for Special Event Campaign (using Multiple Media) - MTV 2012 VMAs

GOLD - The Marketing Team of the Year was FX (work featured included our The League work)

SILVER for Art Direction / Sports - 2012 Brooklyn Nets Launch / Nets

Thank you to everyone involved!
